definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The fifth part is specifically investigating Chinese labor contract law.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分具体考察我国劳动合同法的社会法属性。

sentences.english: Graydon Smith's career in contract law is off to an unpromising start.
sentences.chinese: 在合同法中的事业终止于一个毫无未来的开端。

sentences.english: We will strictly enforce the Employment Promotion Law and the Labor Contract Law.
sentences.chinese: 认真贯彻执行就业促进法和劳动合同法。

sentences.english: We can find that the law-maker also has this opinion from the stipulation of the…
sentences.chinese: 从合同法中可以看出我国立法者也倾向于这种观点。

sentences.english: In this thesis, the foreseeability rule of the contract law is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文对合同法领域的可预见性规则作了研究。

sentences.english: We take property law. We take contract law.
sentences.chinese: 我们学习物权法和合同法。

sentences.english: The concept of Bona Fides is the reflection of the abstract notion of Fairness in Contract Law.
sentences.chinese: 诚信概念是极端抽象的公平观念在合同法中的反映。

sentences.english: Pacta sunt servanda is one of the basic principias in contract law.
sentences.chinese: “合同必须严守”是合同法的基本原理。

sentences.english: The rule of Estoppel is important on the Anglo - American insurance law.
sentences.chinese: 禁止抗辩原则是保险合同法的一条重要原则。

sentences.english: The new Chinese contract law establishes the counter plea system.
sentences.chinese: 新的《合同法》确立了抗辩权制度。

sentences.english: Restatement of the Law, Second, Contracts.
sentences.chinese: 法律重述，第二次，合同法。

sentences.english: The introduction of collateral obligation is a reformation of traditional contract law.
sentences.chinese: 附随义务法律问题的提出是对传统合同法理论的变革。

sentences.english: Two of the largest categories of civil law are contract law and tort law.
sentences.chinese: 民法中最大两个类别是合同法和侵权法。

sentences.english: Ineffective product liability lies between the field of contract and tort .
sentences.chinese: 无效产品责任处于合同法和侵权行为法的交错领域。

sentences.english: An analogical application item was added to the new Contract Laws which was en-acted last year in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国去年颁布的《合同法》中增加了类推适用条款。

sentences.english: The bulk of American contract law is judge-made case law.
sentences.chinese: 美国合同法的大部分是由法官创制的判例法。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
